info.title: My Jobs
info.description: Laravel API documentation for the 'My Jobs' application.

500.description: There was a problem registering the user.

message.example: There was a problem registering the user.

post.summary: Logs out the user and invalidates the JWT token.
post.description: Logs out the user and invalidates the JWT token.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of vacancies published by the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of vacancies published by the authenticated user.

200.description: A list of vacancies published by the authenticated user.

long_description.example: Fazendo teste de tal tal tal.

email_verified_at.description: Email verified at of the user.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of vacancies published by the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of vacancies published by the authenticated user.

200.description: A list of vacancies published by the authenticated user.

long_description.example: Fazendo teste de tal tal tal.

email_verified_at.description: Email verified at of the user.

get.summary: Apply or unapply to a vacancy
get.description: Apply or unapply to a specific vacancy.

message.example: User John applied to Vacancy XYZ

get.description: Returns a paginated list of vacancies optionally filtered by parameters.

post.description: Create a new vacancy with the provided data.

short_description.description: Short description of the vacancy (between 5 and 60 characters).

long_description.description: Long description of the vacancy (between 10 and 250 characters).

user_id.description: ID of the user creating the vacancy.

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update.

get.description: Retrieve details of a single vacancy by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the vacancy to retrieve

email_verified_at.description: Email verified at of the user.

put.description: Update an existing vacancy with the provided data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the vacancy to be updated

short_description.description: Short description of the vacancy (between 5 and 60 characters).

long_description.description: Long description of the vacancy (between 10 and 250 characters).

user_id.description: ID of the user updating the vacancy.

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update.

403.description: Unauthorized - The user is not authorized to update this vacancy.

delete.description: Delete a vacancy by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the vacancy to delete

403.description: Unauthorized - The user is not authorized to delete this vacancy.
